name: On the Thin Ice
description:
What

Help Yeti to cross the river while running away from the hunter, but be careful of the thin ice!

Controls

Note: Only gamepads are supported!

  • Right Stick - move right leg
  • Left Stick - move left leg
  • Right Trigger - step down right
  • Left Trigger - step down left

Use sticks to position your legs, and triggers to gently step your feet

Tools
  • Unity
  • DOTween
  • Audacity
  • Krita
  • Notion
Credits
